definitions: the quality of being low in price, especially in relation to similar items or services

examples.text: the relative cheapness of imported goods
the ease and cheapness of internet shopping

shortDefinitions: quality of being low in price

definitions: the condition of costing less due to being of inferior quality

examples.text: the plastic chassis contributes a sense of cheapness

shortDefinitions: condition of costing less due to being of inferior quality

definitions: the quality of requiring little effort or sacrifice, especially where this is regarded as devaluing the outcome

examples.text: I'm disgusted with the cheapness of this team

shortDefinitions: quality of requiring little effort or sacrifice

definitions: the quality of being selfish with money; miserliness

examples.text: my father's cheapness is the reason I feel ill when I lose even small amounts of money
better to pay a little for backup now than regret your cheapness later

shortDefinitions: quality of being selfish with money
